name: Sneaky Snacks - Hidden Object Game
description:
Take the role of a chef who has been given the task to cook the kings royal feast. There is only one problem... the snacks are missing!

Embark on a hidden object journey where you must find over 40 different snacks & objects across 20 unique medieval style levels. Once completed you will unlock 10 challenging bonus levels to really test your skills.


You will have to beat the clock but don't worry as you'll have time bonuses and even mini games to earn extra hints along your journey!


Search high and low as you may never know where those pesky snacks are hiding.


Sneaky Snacks is a simple but relaxing game which should take roughly 1-2 hours to complete for intermediate players of this genre! At this current time 31 Steam Achievements are available to be unlocked with more to be released in future for all you achievement hunters.

Best of luck!
